extends Object
implements InputFormat<K,V>

      • listStatus

        protected org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileStatus[] listStatus(BSPJob job)
                                                throws IOException
        List input directories. Subclasses may override to, e.g., select only files matching a regular expression.
        Parameters:
        job - the job to list input paths for
        Returns:
        array of FileStatus objects
        Throws:
        IOException - if zero items.

      • getSplits

        public InputSplit[] getSplits(BSPJob job,
                     int numSplits)
                       throws IOException
        Splits files returned by listStatus(BSPJob) when they're too big.
        numSplits will be ignored by the framework.
        Specified by:

      • getSplitHosts

        protected String[] getSplitHosts(org.apache.hadoop.fs.BlockLocation[] blkLocations,
                     long offset,
                     long pSplitSize,
                     org.apache.hadoop.net.NetworkTopology clusterMap)
                          throws IOException
        This function identifies and returns the hosts that contribute most for a given split. For calculating the contribution, rack locality is treated on par with host locality, so hosts from racks that contribute the most are preferred over hosts on racks that contribute less
        Parameters:
        blkLocations - The list of block locations
        offset -
        pSplitSize -
        Returns:
        array of hosts that contribute most to this split
        Throws:
        IOException
